sqlMap.statement:
SELECT A.INTFC_ID AS INTFC_ID, A.BIZ_API_ID AS BIZ_API_ID, A.INTFC_ID_DESC_TXT AS INTFC_ID_DESC_TXT, A.TRGT_BAT_JOB_NM AS TRGT_BAT_JOB_NM, A.TRGT_BAT_JOB_DESC_TXT AS TRGT_BAT_JOB_DESC_TXT, A.ACTV_FLG AS ACTV_FLG, A.FRCE_QUEUE_ENBL_FLG AS FRCE_QUEUE_ENBL_FLG, A.EZUPTIME AS EZUPTIME, A.EZUPTIMEZONE AS EZUPTIMEZONE FROM( SELECT MIIC.INTFC_ID AS INTFC_ID, MIIC.BIZ_API_ID AS BIZ_API_ID, MIIC.INTFC_ID_DESC_TXT AS INTFC_ID_DESC_TXT, MIIC.TRGT_BAT_JOB_NM AS TRGT_BAT_JOB_NM, MIIC.TRGT_BAT_JOB_DESC_TXT AS TRGT_BAT_JOB_DESC_TXT, MIIC.ACTV_FLG AS ACTV_FLG, MIIC.FRCE_QUEUE_ENBL_FLG AS FRCE_QUEUE_ENBL_FLG, MIIC.EZUPTIME AS EZUPTIME, MIIC.EZUPTIMEZONE AS EZUPTIMEZONE FROM MDB_INBD_INTFC_CONFIG MIIC WHERE MIIC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MIIC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND MIIC.INTFC_ID LIKE #cMsg.intfcId#
ORDER BY MIIC.INTFC_ID ASC ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #rowNum#
